title: [K-12] Math Information Literacy Competency Enhancement Program Based on the I-LEARN Model

context.prior_knowledge: Basic information retrieval skills and understanding of foundational college-level mathematics concepts
context.additional_context: Online asynchronous educational environment focused on cultivating information evaluation and utilization skills required for mathematical research and learning

learning_goals: Learners can select credible mathematics-related materials from academic databases with 90% accuracy.
Learners apply a 5-step checklist for evaluating information sources to analyze the validity of academic materials.
Learners systematically cite at least three references for solving mathematical problems using the I-LEARN research guide within the LMS.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
